description: Concatenation of prime factors of n-th Fibonacci number.
maple: A055642 := proc(n) if n =0 then 1 ; else ilog10(n)+1 ; fi ; end: catDigs := proc(L) local a,k,i ; a := 0 ; for i from 1 to nops(L) do a := a*10^A055642(L[i])+L[i] ; od ; end: A037276 := proc(n) local L,i,ifs,j ; if n = 1 then 0 else ifs := ifactors(n)[2] ; L := [] ; for i in ifs do for j from 1 to op(2,i) do L := [op(L),op(1,i)] ; od: od: catDigs(L) ; fi ; end: A038526 := proc(n) A037276(combinat[fibonacci](n)) ; end: seq(A038526(n),n=3..20) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 12 2007
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 27 2010
